Detailed Description

Represents a group of Animations that should be played together.

The transformation of each individual animation are composed together into a single transform. If AnimationSet sets any properties that its children also set (for example, duration), the values of AnimationSet override the child values.

The way that AnimationSet inherits behavior from Animation is important to understand. Some of the Animation attributes applied to AnimationSet affect the AnimationSet itself, some are pushed down to the children, and some are ignored, as follows:

  • duration, repeatMode: These properties, when set on an AnimationSet object, will be pushed down to all child animations.
  • repeatCount: These properties are ignored for AnimationSet.
  • startOffset, shareInterpolator: These properties apply to the AnimationSet itself. 
 Animation *anim1 = new AlphaAnimation(0.1f,0.9f);
 Animation *anim2 = new RotateAnimation(0.0f,360.0f,10.0f,100.0f);
 AnimationSet *animset = new AnimationSet(true);
 AccelerateInterpolator *ip = new AccelerateInterpolator();

 anim1->setStartOffset(500);
 anim1->setDuration(1500);
 anim1->setRepeatCount(0);
 anim2->setStartOffset(400);
 anim2->setDuration(1400);
 anim2->setRepeatCount(1);
 animset->addAnimation(anim1);
 animset->addAnimation(anim2);
 animset->setInterpolator(ip);

 ImageWidget *ImWidg = new ImageWidget(this);
 ImWidg->startAnimation(anim);

 delete anim1;
 delete anim2;
 delete animset;
 delete ip;

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::core::AnimationSet::AnimationSet ( bool  shareInterpolator) [explicit]

Constructor to use when building an AnimationSet from code.

Parameters:
shareInterpolatorPass true if all of the animations in this set should use the interpolator assocciated with this AnimationSet. Pass false if each animation should use its own interpolator.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::core::AnimationSet::addAnimation ( Animation *  a) [virtual]

Add a child animation to this animation set.

The transforms of the child animations are applied in the order that they were added

Parameters:
aAnimation to add.
